situation.title: Football
situation.meta_description: Currently, leisure time sports, including football, are prohibited.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Currently, leisure time sports, including football, are prohibited. It follows from the ban on the free movement of people and the mandatory closure of all indoor and outdoor sports grounds for the public. It is also not allowed to organise any amateur football competitions. The only exception is in place for professional footballers. You can learn more about the rules and restrictions, including those for fans, in the Sports Events section.

questions_answers.question: I am a district football league player. Am I a professional athlete?
questions_answers.value: No, professional athletes have sport as their primary job. In that manner, the exception is not in place for you.

questions_answers.question: Can I play football with my friends at the local meadow?
questions_answers.value: No, you would violate the ban on the free movement of people.

questions_answers.question: Can I play football with my dad and brothers in our garden?
questions_answers.value: Yes, it is not a public space, and also you are members of the same household.
